title: ICT-Based Hierarchical Science Learning Design Course

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of fundamental science theories and practical field experience
context.additional_context: Customized science education utilizing VR simulations and mobile learning tools in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can decompose and analyze complex scientific phenomena into hierarchical stages through VR simulations
Learners can plan and execute science problem-solving projects using mobile-based ICT tools
Learners can develop science education scenarios by applying hierarchical learning design principles

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
